maqras.text: jabilousin hananimkkeseo
kkulan-eul galeucheog jusyeossnola
geubun-eun ingan-eul changjohasa
pyohyeon-ui bangbeob-eul galeuchyeo jusyeoss eumyeo
taeyang-gwa dal-eun jeonghayeojin gwedoleulttaleugo
chomogdo geubunkke sunjonghanola
haneul-eul dudoe nop-i dusigo gyunhyeong-eul dusyeoss-euni
neohuiga jeoul-eul sog-iji anhdologhagi wihaeseola
geuleomeulo mugeleul dal-a jeoul-ibujoghaji anhge hala
daejineun geubun-ui pijomuldeul-eul wihae dusyeossnola
geugos-eneun gwasil-i issgo song-ileul ilun jonglyeonamuga iss-eumyeo
gogsiggwa geugeos-ui ipdeulgwa julgiwa hyangchoga issnola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghandan mal-inyo
geubun-eun dojagileul mandeuldeus in gan-eul heulg-eulo bich-eusyeoss-eumyeo
yeongmaleul changjohadoe hwayeom-eulo mandeusyeossnola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geubun-eun dongjjog-ui junim-iyo seo jjog-ui junim-isigeoneul
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geubunkkeseo du badaleul jayulub ge heuleuge hago mannage hadoe
dul saie jangbyeog-eul duni geu deul gagjaneun chimbeomhaji ani hanola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geu dugos-eseo jinjuwa sanhoga naonila

sancheoleom nop-eun baega bada-e sunhyanghaneun geos-eun geubun-ui sangjing-ila
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhe jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
daeji wiui modeun geos-eun myeolmanghadoe
geudae junim-eun yeong-wonhasa gwonneung gwa yeong-gwang-eulo chungmanhasinila
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhe jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
haneul-e issneun geosgwa daejie issneun modeun geos-i geubunkke guhani geubun-eun maeil saeloun yeong-gwang-eul haenghasido da
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
god hananimkkeseo neohui du muli ui ildeul-eul haegyeolhalila
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
yeongmawa ingan-ui muliyeo neohui ga haneulgwa daejiui yeong-yeog-eul beos-eonal su issdamyeon beos-eona bola gwonneung-i ju eojiji anihagoneun beos-eonaji moshalila
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
hwayeomgwa yeongiga neohui dumu li wie ileuge doelila geuttae neohuineun neohui seuseuloleul bohohal su eobsnani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
haneul-i bunlidoego saeppalgan jang mimich saegkkal-i doenani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo

joeindeul-eun geudeul-ui oehyeong-eulo allyeojige doeni geudeul-ui meoliwa bal deul-i butjabhige doelila

igeos-i balo joeindeul-i geoyeog han jiog-imae
deulkkeulhneun tteugeoun mul sog-eseo geudeul-eun banghwanghanola

neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
ingangwa yeongmaga seuchyeoboji a nihan baeujadeul-ila

geudeul-eun chologbich bangseoggwa aleum daun yungdan-e mom-eul gidaenola

gwonneung-gwa yeong-gwang-eulo chungmanhasin junim ileum wie chugbog-i iss-eusoseo
